authors: Chase me ladies, I'm the Cavalry

intersection_intro: An {em_start}intersection{em_end} is a collection of articles in {tooltitle}. You can create one and share a link to it so others can browse {tooltitle} restricted to the articles you specified.
intersection_import_prompt: To create an intersection, you need to import a list of articles. Where would you like to import from?
import_articles_prompt: Please enter Wikipedia {em_start}article titles{em_end} to import, one per line, in the area below:
import_petscan_intro: {em_start}PetScan{em_end} is a powerful tool for querying Wikipedia and defining lists of articles. After a user makes a query, PetScan assigns it an ID that can be used to import the query into other tools.
import_petscan_prompt: Please {link_start}create your query in PetScan{link_end} and paste its URL or ID below:
intersection_end_copy_link: You can copy and share the link above to allow other people to browse the intersection.
introduction: Help find citations for Wikipedia articles!
instructions_goal: The Wikipedia snippet below is not backed by a {link_start}reliable source{link_end}. Can you find one?
instructions_details: Click %s to go to Wikipedia and fix the snippet, or %s to see another one. Check %s if you have questions. Good luck!
intersection_notice: You are browsing a restricted group of articles. You can {link_start}click here{link_end} to return to unrestricted {tooltitle}
lead_section_hint: This text is part of the article's lead section, so referencing it may be optional. Please see %s for more information.
github_link_title: Hey! My source is on GitHub!
beginners_hint: Don't know how to add citations? See %s.
page_not_found_text: The page you are looking for no longer exists â€” perhaps this citation has already been found? Go back to %s for more!
footer: %s is made by volunteers, hosted on %s and translated via %s.
leaderboard_description: These are users that fixed the most snippets through {tooltitle} in the past {days} days. Well done!
js-leaving-intersection: You are navigating away from the current intersection. Are you sure?
js-intersection-created: Your intersection has been created! It contains snippets from $1 {{PLURAL:$1|article|articles}} of the imported articles and is valid for $2 {{PLURAL:$2|day|days}}:
